00022 #ifndef PACKAGE_DEPENDENCY_H
00023 #define PACKAGE_DEPENDENCY_H
00024 
00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <vector>
00027 #include <libxml/tree.h>
00028 #include "Revision.h"
00029 #include "FeatureOption.h"
00030 #include "BooleanExpression.h"
00031 
00032 class Package;
00033 class InstallEntry;
00034 
00035 using std::string;
00036 using std::vector;
00037 
00039 class PackageDependency
00040 {
00041 public:
00042   PackageDependency();
00043   PackageDependency(const PackageDependency& clone);
00044   PackageDependency(const PackageDependency& clone, string minRevision, string maxRevision);
00045   PackageDependency(string name, string minRevision, string maxRevision, string type);
00046   ~PackageDependency();
00047   bool IsSatisfiedBy(const Package * package) const;
00048   bool IsSatisfiedBy(const InstallEntry * package) const;
00049   bool IsSatisfiedBy(const string& packageName, const Revision& revision) const;
00050   string GetName() const;
00051   string GetString() const;
00052   string GetType() const;
00053   string GetMinRevision() const;
00054   string GetMaxRevision() const;
00055   bool SetType(string type);
00056   void SetCondition(const BooleanExpression& condition);
00057   string GetDependentString() const;
00058   string GetDependentName() const;
00059   void SetDependentName(string name);
00060   string GetDependentRevision() const;
00061   void SetDependentRevision(string revision);
00062   bool Save(xmlNodePtr parentNode);
00063   bool Load(xmlNodePtr dependencyNode);
00064   bool IsActive(const FeatureOptionVector& features) const;
00065 private:
00067   string mPackageName;
00069   Revision mMinRevision;
00071   Revision mMaxRevision;
00073   BooleanExpression mCondition;
00075   string mType;
00077   string mDependentName;
00079   Revision mDependentRevision;
00080 };
00081 
00082 typedef vector<PackageDependency *> PackageDependencyVector;
